articles.author: Adam Pengilly
articles.title: 'No regrets': Greenberg plans to remain NRL's 'biggest fan' - The Age
articles.description: The former NRL chief executive said there will be "another chapter" in his first public statement since walking away from the game on Monday.
articles.content: "I love the game. I have loved the game since I was a little boy. I'll continue to be its greatest fan. As will my family. We'll watch all the games. We've loved it. As I said, it's been a fantastic journey. We've met great people. And I walk away being a gre… [+1662 chars]

articles.title: 'Dying to get out there': Fit Simmons desperate for NBA return - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: The back problem that forced the Australian to miss games after February's All-Star match has all but dissipated and he is "dying to get out there" and play.
articles.content:
NBA Commissioner Adam Silver told reporters last week he could not say if the season will re-start, or whether it would be abandoned.
